com.github.lucbui.pipeline

Interface PointerFieldFriendlyReadPipe

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReadPipe<FieldObject>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PointerFieldFriendlyDoublePipe
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OffsetFieldPipe, PaletteFieldPipe, SpriteFieldPipe

    public interface PointerFieldFriendlyReadPipe
extends ReadPipe<FieldObject>
    A ReadPipe which correctly handles PointerFields. If the incoming field has the @PointerField annotation, a Pointer is read at the iterator, rather than the normal object. The actual object is then read from that Pointer. If @PointerField is not encountered, the object is read as normal.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object makeObject(FieldObject object, HexFieldIterator iterator, HexFramework hexFramework)
      Create the object that should be wrapped in the PointerObject, if it is a PointerField.
      default void read(FieldObject object, HexFieldIterator iterator, HexFramework hexFramework)
      Modify an instance of an object, using a HexFieldIterator
